page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES, HENFIELD.
page.content: During our playtimes we find there are plenty of different games to play. We are lucky because we have a large field to play on or a very large asphalt playground. Here are some games. Elastics by Fiona. For elastics you need 3 yards of strong elastic about a centimetre wide. It should be knotted together. Two people step inside the Elastic and and one person is the leader. The leader does something and the next person copies. If they make a mistake they are out and another person takes their place. It is fun to play and sometimes quite difficult. Field Games In the summer we can use the field. We play football and cricket. We can run freely and play leapfrog. It is good fun on the field.
